channel.title: Sara brews? I need help please!
channel.description:
[left][/left] Hello, Can someone help me making sara brews like this [img]http://C:\Users\baris.veliuyar-PC\Desktop[/img] [ Sorry not good at posting pictures yet ] Instead of they look like this..
Well cant figure out pictures -.- They have to be like unnoted mantas. When i spawn like 1million sara brews (4) they come in 1m brews in 1 inventory space I want it to be like 1 sara brew per inv.
Post please
